channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Fly tipping again on Fendyke road, 22nd November
item.description:
Yet more bags dumped here.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Fendyke Road, West Heath, Greater London

item.title: Various pavement defects dangerous to walk over/around, 22nd November
item.description:
The whole of the pavement area from under the railway walkway up to the turning towards Marlowe House on the public footpath There are numerous lifted and sunken paving slabs. A lady tripped and fell recently and had to attend A&E This is a serious defective area of approx 10m x 25m (could be larger, this is my estimate)
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1, Station Road, Longlands, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Black bags piled up, 22nd November
item.description:
These appeared on Thursday evening. Obviously they were not taken on the Friday collection as they were not in a wheelie bin. Some have now been ripped open by foxes and at least one has blow further down the street.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Skipworth Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet
